body:
## About the package
Time series data is particularly hard to cluster.  It is often high dimensional, and not iid.  This package hopes to provide a suite of clustering algorithms, in hopes that one works for your data!  tsclust is currently not available on CRAN and is still in major development.

## Clustering techniques

### K-means
Standard k-means

### Hierarchical Clustering
hclust using correlation distance, euclidean distance, DTW, ...

### Extrema Clustering
Clustering based on when local extrema occur

### Frequency Domain Clustering
Clustering based on the smoothed periodogram

### [Jure Leskovec Clustering](http://cs.stanford.edu/people/jure/pubs/memeshapes-wsdm11.pdf)

### Clustering using Change of Basis
NMF and/or [Principal Dynamical Components](http://math.nyu.edu/faculty/tabak/publications/DPCcpam.pdf)
name: Tsclust
